attributes.additional_details:
We call for an immediate national referendum regarding all future potential and direct conflict before any action is taken, unless that country has officially declared war with the United Kingdom.

Also applying to the most urgent, current war in Syria.

This is a democracy and we have the right to voice our opinions on these major issues. Our money being used while the country struggles. These conflicts affect us in all ways. Peace isn't found through violence of any kind. Violence only creates hate and promotes violence in every case.

Back up the words we hear so often about bringing peace to the people by ensuring it is found through diaglogue not conflict. This is our responsibility.
